segments.text: The boy’s determination to get those cookies is impressive, but also terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on that stool like a circus performer, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly about to tip, and he doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around to see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and the floor is getting more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step in and stop the boy before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the chaos inside is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
